alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Hill (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 7:29PM CST until March 02 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hill County in central Texas... Ellis County in north central Texas... * Until 800 PM CST. * At 728 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ferris to near Hillsboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waxahachie, Ennis, Hillsboro, Ferris, Palmer, Italy, Bardwell, Alma, Bynum, Carl`s Corner, Bardwell Lake, Aquilla Lake, Garrett, Milford, Bristol, Mertens, Avalon, Irene, Howard and Boyce. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 363 and 369. Interstate 35E between mile markers 371 and 396. Interstate 45 between mile markers 244 and 266. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for central and north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
